= Modifying graph orientation =

By default:

{{{depend_app.exe depend/trunk/src/* --render=graph --output=depend.png}}}

depend.png

With {{{--graph="rankdir=LR"}}} (see [http://www.graphviz.org/doc/info/attrs.html Graphviz documentation] for more informations):

{{{depend_app.exe depend/trunk/src/* --render=graph --output=depend.png --graph="rankdir=LR"}}}

depend2.png
